wikipedia_page.main: Nick Tandy (born 5 November 1984) is a professional British racing driver currently racing for Corvette Racing in the IMSA WeatherTech SportsCar Championship.  His major victories include the 2015 24 Hours of Le Mans, the 2015 Petit Le Mans, the 2018 24 Hours of Nürburgring and the 2020 24 Hours of Spa. He scored also class win at the 2014 24 Hours of Daytona and 2018, 2019, 2020 12 Hours of Sebring.
